function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in work and leisure locations due to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and mental health challenges","Mitigation":"Flexible work arrangements and mental health support","Technologies":"Remote work technology, telemedicine","People":"Remote workers, individuals in isolation","Owner":"Employers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Focus on indoor environment quality and building materials","Impact":"Reduced risk of disease spread and improved well-being","Mitigation":"Use of high-quality ventilation and antimicrobial surfaces","Technologies":"Air purification systems, antimicrobial coatings","People":"Occupants of residential buildings","Owner":"Architects, building managers, homeowners"},{"Description":"Rethinking of sustainability requirements for residential buildings","Impact":"Reduced environmental impact and improved health outcomes","Mitigation":"Adoption of sustainable design principles and materials","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, sustainable building materials","People":"Architects, builders, homeowners","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, building industry stakeholders"}]}
